reviews.text:
I absolutely love this place! Nice atmosphere, good service and decent price.

You can choose wherever you want to seat then the waiter will serve a welcome drink to you. They have English menu if you ask for it.  Iâ€™ve been there twice when I was staying in Skopje. The drinks and food were okay above average. The portion of the make your own pasta was big!

Card payments accepted.

Name of place: Public Room.

Public Room has a massive space, both indoors and outdoors, so I chose to sit outside. The service was impressively fast, and it seemed like a trendy spot for students to hang out. I ordered the meat and bacon wrap, and it arrived quicklyâ€”just 8 minutes and 21 seconds! However, the speed didnâ€™t do any favors for the dish. The cheese wasnâ€™t melted, and the wrap itself had uneven heatâ€”. The meat was disappointingly bland, but I did enjoy the pickled veggies and mayo. The atmosphere was laid-back with chill music, and to top it off, they even threw in a free dessert on the house! Can't complain too much about that!

Amazing place with amazing food and atmosphere. Great service, friendly, helpful and very fast.
We went to enjoy comedian stand up.
We had a great time and definitely will get back in future.
Food size portions are really big and you will not leave this place hungry :) very affordable prices.
Coziest place with a lovely team! You can work here, guys have diverse menu options. The portions are so big they packed a half of mine in a takeaway box ðŸ˜Š

5 star for Public Room, because one week ago I wrote a review saying that the heating is very low. After few days they changed the heating to a very good level, which I much appreciate, because usually I do my work there and stay for 2-3 hours, and being cold it's not a great feeling. You definitely deserve a 5 star for being absolutely amazing hosts. Also I must say that the food portions are very big which I.Also appreciate very very much . They are not very cheap , but if you calculate how much ingredients they put in them , they are definitely cheap
